steps.title: Configure your Dashboard
steps.content: Click here to start making changes to the reports that appear on your dashboard

steps.title: Choose your Reports
steps.content: This where you can see all the available reports. Drag the one(s) you want down into the right or left column.

steps.title: Removing Reports
steps.content: If you want to remove a report, you can drag it up to the dark grey area above.

steps.title: Finish
steps.content: When you've finished arranging the reports, click here to save the changes
